original_text: By faith Joseph, when he died, made mention of the departing of the children of Israel; and gave commandment concerning his bones.
korean_text: 믿음으로 요셉은 임종시에 이스라엘 자손들이 떠날 것을 말하고 또 자기 뼈를 위하여 명하였으며

sentences.original_text: made mention of the departing of the children of Israel
and gave commandment concerning his bones
